fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Imprisonment (Day): Cast a spell upon a member of the town, making them believe they were hauled off to jail. You will be able to speak to them as Jailor, or if he is dead, Wisteria.
Restoration (Night): Upgrade a Coven members defense by one stage permanently, to a maximum of Invincible.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Coven Heads, and the Coven Leader cannot spawn with you.
You have Necronomicon Priority.
Only 1 Coven Head may spawn per game.

fields.name: Necronomicon:
fields.value: Gain the ability to execute your Imprisoned target.
